'''''"He Never Dies"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|"He Never Dies"|text="He Never Dies" — Dragon Defier}} while completing challenge conditions.
